extendedInfo.description: =======IMPORTANT=======I'm so sorry.The old access keys have been revoked. You need to log into the app again.- Update tweecha to v5.2.- Start tweecha app. (the information of authorization shown)- Push menu button on device, and select 'account'.- Push 'add account' button. (DON'T REMOVE ACCOUNTS. The accounts on the list is not active until re-authorize. If you have 3 or more accounts, you have to remove account(s) to activate 'add-account' button)- Re-authorize your using account. get pin code, and entry pin-code to the bottom text box and push 'ok' button.- If you see no information of authorization, it is finished.- If you have 2 or more accounts, repeat this step.=========================Latest information is here: http://sinproject.net/tweecha_en/We'll also give you the latest information on @tweecha. Please follow me.If you have any questions or troubles, please contact @tweecha.(No DM, No mail, or others. Please contact @tweecha)The account of the author is @iam_o_sin.---Tweecha is a very useful Twitter client for Android. It allows easy access to show conversations, images, and replies to your friends while displaying the original message. You can also reply to multiple tweets.Tweecha Theme: You can change the design of tweecha. Please try it!https://play.google.com/store/search?q=tweecha%20theme&c=appsSupports:- Manage multiple accounts- User timeline over streaming- Inline thumbnail- Color label for user- Mute user, app and text- Conversation view on tweet detail screen- Menu to access each timelines and each list.- Pull to refresh- Save Image- Show read status (orange line)- Mark as read, or unread- Move to unread position- Show user information when clicking user profile image- Easy access: change lists with Swiping, pushing button, and from menu.- Manage multiple accounts- Showing full size image on display- Notification of mentions and direct messages- Translation function (long press on tweet, work with Google translation app)- Rich friends information with tweets, favorites, follows, followers, and so on.- Twitter Lists: push lists button to access lists- Profile View shows tweet, follows, followers, favorites, listed counts- Push counts buttons on profile view to access timelines.- Following list, Followers list.- Tweet ways: Tweet, replay, retweet, qt, favorites.- Sharing: share tweet, share text, and share URL- Favorites star appears on timeline- Direct message support- Search user, search tweet.- Moving: move to first, move to last, move to unread- Multi-language support: English and Japanese- Switch to show name or not- Size customize: icon, name, screen name, text, additions- Color Theme: Dark and Light- Notification settings- Easy twitter authentication- Version information: check settings- Confirmation settings- Confirm tweet, retweet, favorite, follow, unfollow- Tweet shows with line break- Color label settings- Delete tweet- Start app from twitter search, profile, status url- Start app from tweet button on web browser- Change color label width- Default color label visible setting- Move on refresh setting- Jump to Top from menu- Send @tweet from profile page- Position setting on refresh- Refresh button- Show support account- Fast scroll support- "Show refresh button" setting- Restore scroll position- Install to SD card- Save tweet as draft and as template- Shows reply tweet in tweet screen- Save search keywords- Save posted hashtags- Change background color to replies to your tweets- Change background color of your tweets- Auto update on startup- Enable mute settings- Select mute targets- Block user- Report user for spam- Post to TwitLonger- Reply to multiple tweets- Thumbnailsï¼via.me, twimg.com, twitpic, Mobypicture, yFrog, movapic, f.hatena.ne.jp, PhotoShare, img.ly, brightkite, brightkite, youtube, imgur, TweetPhoto, Plixi, Lockerz, Ow.ly, Instagram, photozou, twipple, Flickr, Streamzoo

reviews.title: Almost!
reviews.comment: This app is almost perfect (so far). I just hope it can: 1. Filter the search. Like, filtering pictures only. So it\'s easy to search for pictures (aka right to the point). 2. Sometimes the avatar still won\'t change. Like, \"it changed successfully\" but when we open twitter via web, our avatar still the same/the old one. 3. Change header feature!   I hope this could be taken into consideration! I loove tweecha. Not many friends know it so I always recommend this to them!
reviews.author: erwin miftah

reviews.title: Ok.
reviews.comment: I love this app but I got problem everytime I use it. First my account cannot auth. Then the picture cannot be opened (it tells about the java and ask me to download java first). So I have to uninstal it.   I still wait for this app if the problem fixed. Thx.
reviews.author: Syarefa Camelia

reviews.title: Lovee
reviews.comment: I\'ve actually dloaded it b4 but it was giving me some prob so uninstall it but im glad i install it back . This is by far, the best twitter app ever. I don\'t usually write reviews  bt this app deserves it:) PS , I\'m still having trouble uploading my picture
reviews.author: Valkyrie xin

reviews.title: Need to be improved ..
reviews.comment: Just need to organize the tabs properly [horizontally] in the order Timeline- Mentions - Messages - Retweets - Lists etc.. Otherwise its a good start for the app from Japan..
reviews.author: Jose Mathew

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is a perfect app.
reviews.author: Stephen Gratia

reviews.title: Limited to 3 accounts
reviews.comment: I once wrote a very positive writeup for the app, but since it\'s put limits on multiple accounts (its previous attraction for me), I\'ve uninstalled. Not for people who have more than 3 accounts.
reviews.author: Vivien Huo

reviews.comment: The updates are improving tweecha, no doubt. But trending topic is still missing. And since you added favourites, we would like to know who favourites our tweet.

reviews.comment: I have used nearly all twitter apps but this one is different n really resourceful,just add column for trends n it will be the better than the best twitter app...
